title: Maya

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, select someone to isolate at night.
- Deal a Powerful attack to all attempted visitors of your target  (Costs 5 gold.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Isolated players cannot visit and cannot be visited.
- You generate 2 gold for each attempted visitor to an isolated target. Does not apply if you choose to attack visitors.
- Isolated players will not have access to any Factional chat they’re a part of for the night.
- Passively generate 2 gold at night.
- You may isolate yourself.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were slain by a Mayan hul’che.” (Factional Kill)
“They were slain by Mayan defenders.” (Attacking visitors of isolated target)
“You were drawn into isolation!” (Target being isolated)
“Your ability failed because your target wasn’t home.” (Attempting to visit someone isolated)

*“You pay for cacao with cacao, money with money, and corn with corn.”  -Mayan proverb*
